name: SANSARA
description:
Sansara - the cycle of infinity. A circle from which few can escape.

It’s a clicker where you have to get out of life’s cycle. You will be reborn again and again. You will make a choice on which your fate will depend directly.  And don’t forget, life doesn’t wait for you.

I specifically didn’t add any descriptions. Just like in life, trial and error, you learn everything yourself.

Despite all the simplicity, most of the time has gone into small things and details that few people will notice. I tried again to make the game not for everyone, but for those who can understand my handwriting.

Thank you for your support <3
